mapper.insert: insert into chat_room (sale_no, seller_id, seller_nk, buyer_id, buyer_nk, first_id, last_id) values (#{no}, #{seller_id}, #{seller_nick}, #{buyer_id}, #{buyer_nick}, #{first_id}, #{last_id})
insert into chat_msg (cr_no, acid, nick, message, first_id, last_id) values (#{cr_no}, #{acid}, #{nick}, #{message}, #{first_id}, #{last_id})
mapper.select: select * from chat_room where (seller_id = #{acid} or buyer_id = #{acid}) and seller_state = 'Y' and buyer_state = 'Y' order by r_date desc
select * from chat_room where sale_no = #{sale_no} and seller_state = 'Y' and buyer_state = 'Y' order by r_date desc
